text.section:
This subchapter governs only:
A limited partnership formed on or after July 12, 2006; and
Except as otherwise provided in subsection (2)(c) and (d) of this section, a limited partnership formed before July 12, 2006, which elects, in the manner provided in its partnership agreement or by law for amending the partnership agreement, to be subject to this subchapter. The filing of an amended or an amended and restated certificate of limited partnership electing limited liability limited partnership status shall constitute an election to be governed by KRS 362.2-102 to 362.2-977.

With respect to a limited partnership that elects, pursuant to subsection (1)(b) of this section, to be subject to this subchapter, after the election takes effect, the provisions of this subchapter relating to the liability of the limited partnership's general partners to third parties apply:
Before January 1, 2009, to:
A third party that had not done business with the limited partnership in the year before the election took effect; and
A third party that had done business with the limited partnership in the year before the election took effect only if the third party knows or has received a notification of the election; and
On or after January 1, 2009, to all third parties.

law.history: Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 193, effective July 12, 2006.
